directions: Simmer rice, milk, coconut milk, sugar, and salt, uncovered, in a 2 1/2- to 3-quart heavy saucepan over moderate heat, stirring frequently, until thickened, about 40 minutes. Stir in vanilla. Serve warm.
ingredients: 1/2 cup well-stirred canned unsweetened coconut milk
title: Coconut Rice Pudding
